title: Lost Keys
content:
I lost my vehicle key in campus today. It's an Ather key, there's another small key with the vehicle key. No keychain, just the default Ather tag. 
Please DM me if you find it, thank you.

comments.body: idk which campus you are but if it's ECE campus go to the reception desk in the lobby and ask the lady/sir who sits there if they found any key

Rr campus u have to go near the ground floor washroom left side where the lost and found is there.. is no one is there go to the teachers cabin window and ask them for the lost and found and if they have the key..
